> ::Fliq::
> 
> Fliq exhales in relief as he is released by Strafe.
> He didn't 
> appreciate being called a housepet, but at least the
> bot wasn't 
> hostile. He looks at Strafe as he tests out his
> various modes, truly 
> impressed. The CR chamber had recorded the bot's
> superstructure, but 
> Fliq hadn't gone through it yet. Seeing a live show
> was always better 
> anyways.
> 
> "You're welcome on the repairs, and yeah, defectors
> are welcome," he 
> says, turning around and walking toward Iron
> Raptor's location. In 
> extreme cases, Fliq knew he couldn't stand a chance
> against this bot, 
> but Iron Raptor probably would, and so would Prowl
> if he was with her.
> 
> "Follow me, I'll take you to the commander," he says
> over his 
> shoulder, motioning for Strafe to follow.

Strafe followed, silently, looking down at Fliq. 

"And who exactly is the Commander?" he asked.
